name: Organic Coconut Balm
description:
This handcrafted Organic Coconut Balm is so incredibly effective in moisturizing and soothing irritated skin.  Organic plantain leaves & chickweed are infused with organic virgin cold pressed coconut oil and added to organic beeswax and organic shea butter. A touch of GMO-free vitamin e is also added to naturally preserve and moisturize.  Coconut oil serves as a protective layer, helping to retain the skin's moisture. Plantain leaves help to stop the itching of eczema, allergic rashes and even poison ivy. Chickweed is an herb that is incredibly healing by reducing inflammation and aiding in tissue repair.
Massage balm onto skin all over morning and night or more often if needed.
2 oz
ingredients: organic coconut oil, organic beeswax, organic shea butter, organic plantain and chickweed extracts, non-GMO vitamin e oil

name: Organic Eucalyptus Chest Rub
description:
This handcrafted Organic Eucalyptus Chest Rub is a safe and natural alternative to traditional drug store rubs that can be full of chemicals, mineral oil and preservatives. Massage 1/4 tsp onto a congested chest a couple times a day to help open up airways and give relief. It's a must have for the cold and flu season!
2 oz
ingredients: organic sunflower oil, organic beeswax, organic eucalyptus essential oil, organic lavender essential oil, organic peppermint essential oil, non-GMO vitamin e oil
{recommended for use on babies 6 months and up, not intended to be substituted for medical attention}

name: Organic Lavender Balm
description:
Handcrafted with organic oils and herbs to give relief from irritation and some much needed hydration. Organic Olive, Pumpkin Seed and Sunflower Seed Oils are used for their high content of Omega Fatty Acids, Vitamins and Minerals. Organic Calendula and Chamomile Flowers are infused into the oil for their healing herbal benefits. Lavender essential oil is used not only for it's heavenly scent but also because it is anti-microbial, anti-septic and anti-bacterial. The organic beeswax and organic shea butter base makes it a great treatment for diaper rash. And finally a touch of GMO-free vitamin e is also added to naturally preserve and moisturize.  Use all over as often as needed.
2 oz
ingredients: organic olive oil, organic beeswax, organic shea butter, organic pumpkin seed and sunflower oil, organic lavender essential oil, organic calendula and chamomile extract, non-GMO vitamin e oil

name: Organic Coconut Wash
description:
Cleanse, soothe and hydrate your baby's delicate skin with this Organic Coconut Wash.  Has a wonderful light coconut aroma that comes naturally from the coconut oil.
Use all over as often as needed.  Just shake well before using!

ingredients: organic saponified oils of coconut, olive and jojoba, organic aloe vera, organic coconut oil, organic rosemary extract

8 oz, also available in a 32 oz refill size

name: Organic Lavender Wash
description:
Cleanse, soothe and hydrate your baby's delicate skin with this Organic Lavender Wash. Great to use right before bedtime to quiet and calm little minds. Use all over even as a shampoo.

ingredients: organic saponified oils of coconut, olive and jojoba, organic aloe vera, organic lavender essential oil, organic rosemary extract

8 oz, also available in a 32 oz refill size
